solution_line_template: He's inviting {num_people} people over and needs {meat_per_person} pound of meat for each so that's {num_people}*{meat_per_person} = <<{num_people}*{meat_per_person}={total_meat}>>{total_meat} pounds of meat
The beef tenderloin is ${price_per_pound} a pound and he needs {total_meat} pounds so that's {price_per_pound}*{total_meat} = $<<{price_per_pound}*{total_meat}={total_cost}>>{total_cost} for dinner
